This might be no help, but based on my (very limited) experience, here's
what I would look at:

Set up your decision rules as follows:

1) REJECT all (RejectDecideRule)
2) ACCEPT by file pattern for what you want (js, jpeg, jpg) - try the
ALL enumeration in MatchesFilePatternDecideRule, it will include lots of
media stuff, but I don't know about javascript
3) ACCEPT by file pattern for anything not covered in step 2
4) ACCEPT seed - SeedAcceptDecideRule

Hope this helps.

Micah
